website_summaries.verdict: The underrated Nike Air Penny IV pays homage to NBA legend Penny Hardaway. While sidelined after its release during the career of the basketball star, the shoes’ retro release in 2012 up to the present is just the right time for it to finally steal the limelight from the other basketball sneakers that were released during its time.For its $160 price tag, basketball sneaker fans should take hold of this classic as it gives real value for money compared to other overhyped up shoe releases of other NBA stars.
pros: A good number of reviewers appreciate the no lacing style for the perfect lockdown fit of the Nike Air Penny IV with the adjustable ankle straps
Several basketball players like the one-piece design that gives a solid look to the shoe
Fans of Penny Hardaway like the One-Cent logo detailing on the upper’s ankle straps and the Penny symbol on the upper as it gives them a nostalgic vibe of the basketball star’s heydays
The retro basketball sneaker has an affordable pricing of $160 per pair according to many sneaker fans
Many buyers claimed the shoes have a versatile style that is worn inside the basketball court and outside as a casual shoe
A large number of basketball players complimented its good fitting that helps them do different movements on the court
Numerous reviewers have grown to love the Nike Air Penny as the silhouette reminds them of the late 1990s when the shoe first came out and worn by Orlando’s Penny Hardaway
Some basketball players find these kicks well-built with the sole having durability and traction that can last for months
Several reviewers praised the Nike designers for retaining the spirals and herringbone pattern on the shoe outsole as it provides a really good grip on the basketball court
In terms of cushioning, some reviewers claimed the visible Heel Air Unit has been retained giving the shoe a softer feel and bounce
Tumbled leather all over the Air Penny IV from Nike according to some online critics looks very promising and beautiful while it also lessens break-in time
A lot of users praised the wider carbon fiber shoe base and strap in providing support to the entire basketball sneaker
cons: Some reviewers noted that the flex grooves all over the forefoot tend to make the shoe look visually bulky
A few reviewers were disappointed that the forefoot Zoom Air unit seems missing from the original release as it doesn’t have the same level of cushioning as before
A few online reviewers are worried that the one-piece upper and ankle strap might not hold up in the long run as the hidden lacing system could eventually loosen up and affect the fit
For ventilation, some reviewers claimed the all leather upper could pose problems on breathability as the only ventilation is on the tongue and might also affect in shape retention

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe style, just a touch to narrow. Material design very pleased. I would buy again maybe larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: This version is a little more rigid than the white coloraway because the main body of the shoe is nubuck and the strap is leather. That subtle flip of materials makes this show more rigid and less comfortable, in my opinion, than the other version which has the nubuck strap and leather shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Laudenslager

customer_reviews.title: My youth!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought those because it reminds me my childhood, but they are king of tight. If you order that, select one size above the original one. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Franck

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a stylish basketball shoe while I'm on the court that also supports my feet/ankles while being lightweight and I found just that in these Penny's. For the price you really can't ask for more. If you're a sneaker head you can wear them for a night out, or if you're looking for non team shoes to hoop in these are great. Very versatile shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were perfect. Arrived just as described. Shipping was delayed so they arrived after my sons birthday. Will buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: murph3688

customer_reviews.title: Penny Basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, shoe looks and feels great. I had this long time ago and very happy with product, excellent shoe for basketball with good ankle support.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great. Kinda like the 11s almost. In person, it doesn't look as good but that's not a problem because it's a simple silhouette. I use it for basketball but you can definitely base an outfit with it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and great price...one of the underrated shoes of Penny’s great collection, but it’s also multipurpose, can blend in with outfits and can use it for athletics...love it!!!💯💯👏🏾👏🏾

customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast!!!! Instant success. Had a lot of complements. Of course people asked where I got these from and I said wouldn't you like to know......

customer_reviews.title: These were the real deal.  Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These were the real deal. I was reluctant, because the price was lower than other places. I never purchase these type of tennis shoes but my husband does. I figured he would let me know if they weren't authentic and I would just return them. They are real and he was happy with his Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: D-Nell

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits as expected, box is in great condition. Will purchase other corways of this shoe. Also I recently started a new YouTube page. If you have any other shoes or colorways you would like me to promote just send me a message thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gene Marks III

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Penny IV Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Reunite with a classic that's been remastered and polished..
